name: The Legend of the Demonic-Baby Punisher
name_original: The Legend of the Demonic-Baby Punisher
description:
From the deepest pits of hell, the babies grow restless.

The world's governments have fallen, you are humanities last hope. 

Shoot Evil Babies, get upgrades and end wrath from the forces of hell.

Boss every 3 days 

(first game thanks for playing)

Credits 

Me - Everything 

SnakyTech6061567 - Shadow Baby idea and original art (also music but I didn't add it)

Hangry_graphics104  - Item idea and original title art

The Gamer Goon Squad - Emotional support 

Thanks and have fun
